ProductsPage.description: The Products page displays a list of available products, allowing users to browse and select items for purchase. It includes product details, filtering options, and review sections.

elements.name: Products Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the products page.

elements.name: Category Women
elements.description: Button to filter products by Women category.

elements.name: Category Men
elements.description: Button to filter products by Men category.

elements.name: Category Kids
elements.description: Button to filter products by Kids category.

elements.name: Brand Polo
elements.description: Link to filter products by Polo brand.

elements.name: Brand H&M
elements.description: Link to filter products by H&M brand.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: Name of the product displayed.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: Price of the product.

elements.name: Product Quantity
elements.description: Input field to specify the quantity of the product.

elements.name: Add to Cart Button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Your Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's name when writing a review.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's email address when writing a review.

elements.name: Add Review Here Textarea
elements.description: Textarea for the user to write their review.

assertions: Verify that the page title contains 'Automation Exercise - Products'
Verify that the 'Category' section is displayed
Verify that the 'Brands' section is displayed
Verify that at least one product is displayed

CartPage.description: This page displays the details of a product after it has been added to the cart. It allows the user to view the cart or continue shopping.

elements.name: View Cart Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the cart page.

elements.name: Continue Shopping Button
elements.description: Button to continue shopping and close the modal.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: Name of the product added to the cart.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: Price of the product.

elements.name: Product Quantity
elements.description: Quantity of the product.

elements.name: Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the cart.

elements.name: Your Name Input
elements.description: Input field for entering your name for review.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for entering your email address for review.

elements.name: Add Review Here Input
elements.description: Textarea for entering your review.

assertions: Verify that the 'Added!' modal is displayed.
Verify that the product name is displayed correctly.
Verify that the product price is displayed correctly.
Verify that the 'View Cart' link is present.
Verify that the 'Continue Shopping' button is present.

UnknownPage.description: This page displays the items in the user's shopping cart, allowing them to review their order and proceed to checkout.

elements.name: Proceed to Checkout Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the checkout page.

elements.name: Cart Item Description
elements.description: Description of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Price
elements.description: Price of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Quantity
elements.description: Quantity of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Total
elements.description: Total price of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Remove Cart Item Button
elements.description: Button to remove an item from the cart.

elements.name: Subscription Email Input
elements.description: Input field for subscription email.

elements.name: Subscription Submit Button
elements.description: Button to submit the subscription form.

assertions: Verify page title contains 'Automation Exercise - Cart'
Verify at least one item is displayed in the cart table
Verify 'Proceed To Checkout' button is displayed
